divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing there when all of the sudden an object came out of nowhere. It was in a downward diagonal angle. It switched lights from blue to green and orange. It freaked me out at first. Just that it changed colors like that, it was almost like a beacon. I tried to find it later, but could find no trace of it. Nasa hasn't said anything about a satallite or a shooting star.I lost sight of it when it went over tree cover.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Henrico
There were no other sightings in Henrico on or around January 10th 2013
Object Shape: Blimp, Bullet, Missile, Disc, Oval, Square, Rectagular, Star-like
